Title: Relates to the liability of a person who makes or uses a false record or statement material to an obligation to pay money to the state or a local government under the tax law
Summary: Relates to the liability of a person who makes or uses a false record or statement material to an obligation to pay money to the state or a local government under the tax law, or who conceals or improperly avoids or decreases an obligation to pay money to the state or a local government under the tax law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the liability of a person who makes or uses a false record or statement material to an obligation to pay money to the state or a local government under the tax law, or who conceals or improperly avoids or decreases an obligation to pay money to the state or a local government under the tax law
